game.name: P0: Byte-Sized Brilliance
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: P0 is a speed-running anomaly horror where you have just 10 seconds to choose a button to smash. Oh, and grades matter when competing to score a far from average desk job. So, what are you waiting for? Crash through 30 floors and into the career of your dreams! ...Your life may just depend on it.
